direction.raw_text: I've had time to think about all of it. Doing a lot of writing. I've written letters to each of the families that lost loved ones on my flight. Some were able to hear my apology, some never will. I've also apologized to all the people who tried to help me along the way, but I couldn't or wouldn't listen, like my wife, I mean my ex wife... (he gets emotional) ...and my son. Again, some were able to forgive me...some never will. (COLLECTS HIMSELF) But at least I'm sober, and I'm grateful for that. Whip gives it to us straight...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And this is gonna sound really stupid coming from a man who's in prison...but for the first time in my life...I'm free. We hold close on WHIP's face as we hear the metallic clang of prison doors shutting. On the sound we cut to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FEDERAL PENITENTIARY -- CELL -- DAY We pan across the concrete cell wall, looking at a small, personal photo collage. We see a photo of NICOLE and SHEILA and a few other AA FOLKS surrounding WHIP who sits in front of a birthday cake in the common room of the prison. We see a photo of WHIP's DAD as an airman. We ultimately land on a photo of NICOLE. We recognize it as the photo WHIP took on the porch of the Whitaker Farm. We pan down to find WHIP writing in a journal. A GUARD comes to the front of his cell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whitaker, you got a visitor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks at the GUARD and nods before taking a last glance at the photo of NICOLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: sits at a lone picnic table in a fence-enclosed courtyard. He checks his watch and looks up.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: EXT.
location: FEDERAL PENITENTIARY -- GUEST YARD -- DAY WHIP

direction.raw_text: stands and walks towards us, towards his visitor. As he gets closer we see a smile break across his face. A smile we haven't seen since he first saw NICOLE. We reverse to see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: WHIP's 17 year old son stands next to a GUARD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have 40 minutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Knuckles, you're looking good. (BEAT) I sent you something for your birthday.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. I got it. Another beat as they can't find a way in to a conversation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a real surprise; a great surprise. I haven't seen you-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: chokes up. WILL nods. It's intense. WHIP motions to the table and they both sit. WILL pulls out a notebook.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: College counselor thought I should come and interview you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great. An interview. Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm writing essays for college applications.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: studies him and laughs...WILL nods and tries to smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen Will, it means everything to me that you came here. You are an amazing kid and you deserve great things... Again WHIP has to tamp down his emotions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So can you help me with this essay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Of course.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: pulls out a small voice recorder and clicks it on...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This essay. I have to do an essay called, "the most fascinating person I've never met." The two men just look at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that's me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: nods, both men are struggling to keep it together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can we pick up where we left off?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: nods, unsure as to where this is going.
direction.name: direction
